column4: I have a laptop that the builtin nic causes problems and i want to stop it from loading. It is loading a 3com 3c59x. How can i stop this from loading on boot up?
or another quesition is if i have a buitin 3c59x on-board nic and lets say i put in a 3c59x pci card how can i have it not load anything for the onboard and load the drivers for the pci card?
if someone can give me a keyword or point me in the right dircetion i think i google can solve the rest
ideally disable the on-board NIC in your BIOS setup (on boot-up)
